name: Slapman
description:
Simple Pac-Man like arcade game made for the VimJam: Collectables

For a Bug-Free(ish) experience: Please download and run game

How to play:

Move using WASD

Press Space to "Eat" and activate floor tiles showing your movement.

Release Space bar to teleport back to beginning of where you started eating.

Collect all the coins to move to the next level

AVOID the monster.

Credits:

Cro (me) made almost all assets used in the game.

Thank you to Joshua McLean for allowing me to use his music so there isn't complete silence.

Huge thanks to Heartbeast for showing a method for procedural level generation.

Contains music ©2020 Joshua McLean (https://joshua-mclean.itch.io)
